Package org.omg.DynamicAny.DynAnyFactoryPackage

This package contains classes and exceptions from the DynAnyFactory interface of the DynamicAny module specified in the OMG The Common Object Request Broker: Architecture and Specification, http://cgi.omg.org/cgi-bin/doc?formal/99-10-07, section 9.2.2.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
InconsistentTypeCodeHelper org/omg/DynamicAny/DynAnyFactoryPackage/InconsistentTypeCodeHelper.java .
 

Exception Summary
InconsistentTypeCode org/omg/DynamicAny/DynAnyFactoryPackage/InconsistentTypeCode.java .
 

Package org.omg.DynamicAny.DynAnyFactoryPackage Description

This package contains classes and exceptions from the DynAnyFactory interface of the DynamicAny module specified in the OMG The Common Object Request Broker: Architecture and Specification, http://cgi.omg.org/cgi-bin/doc?formal/99-10-07, section 9.2.2. Please refer to that OMG specification for further details.

Package Specification

For a precise list of supported sections of official specifications with which the Java 2 Platform, Standard Edition, v.1.4 ORB complies, see Official Specifications for CORBA support in J2SE 1.4.
